titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Great Yarmouth, vpon VVednesday, the 12. of September. 1599 by W. Yonger ... ; the argument whereof was chosen to minister instructions vnto the people, vpon occasion of those present troubles, which then were feared by the Spaniards.
titleStmt.author: Yonger, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, and are to be sold by Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
